title: SETTINGS CANNOT BE RETRIEVED FROM SERVER(ON EVERY LOGIN)
body:
settings all reset after logging in....

ALL settings were set to defaut....

lost my ranked game cause i couldnt use any of my abilities (they wernt on smart cause) AA on attack move on cursor wasent turned on im not even sure what pings were bound to...

replies.body: Same issue here. Had to redo my settings. All my rune pages are gone too.
This should be resolved, let us know if you are still running into issues.
Same. Just before clash i have to struggle with settings.
